title: Study to examine how small scale brewers are calling time on the dwindling pub industry ...
text: ( Source : Nottingham Trent University ) Wednesday 14 October 2015 Study to examine how small scale brewers are calling time on the dwindling pub industry Researchers have embarked on a new study to investigate beer consumption and production
